mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Letter from Teddi Leiden to Dottie Rowe on Department of Public Welfare Hiring Practices

mods:name.mods:namePart: Detre Library & Archives, Heinz History Center

mods:mods.mods:abstract: A letter from Teddi Leiden of ARC Pennsylvania to Dottie Rowe of the Office of Mental Retardation in the Department of Public Welfare regarding the state's hiring practices that led to the employment of individuals who mistreated residents.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records

mods:relatedItem.mods:note: Bob Nelkin Collection of ACC-PARC Records, 1953-2000, MSS 1002 , Detre Library and Archives, Senator John Heinz History Center
